thread.title: Beyonce scolds assistant on red carpet
thread.title_full: Beyonce scolds assistant on red carpet

title: Beyonce scolds assistant on red carpet
text:
Beyonce scolds her fastidious personal assistant on the red carpet, saying “Stop it!” Network Vision News Corp Australia Network Beyonce scolds her fastidious personal assistant on the red carpet, saying “Stop it!” Network Vision News Corp Australia Network The Queen has spoken ... Beyonce scolds her personal assistant. Picture: Getty 
BEYONCE’S assistant felt the wrath when she got between Queen Bey and the cameras at the Tidal X: 1020 event overnight. 
Beyonce lived up to her flawless fashion reputation, hitting the red carpet in a plunging, thigh-high maroon grown complete with ponytail perfection. 
Posing in a fur stole, the confident singer smiled to the cameras vying for her attention. “Right here, queen!” shouted one photographer. Music royalty ... Beyonce attends TIDAL X: 1020 in New York City. Picture: AFP 
While the singer seemed pleased with her appearance, her personal primper Sam Greenberg wouldn’t stop fussing over her dress. 
In the clip that is now going viral, Queen Bey scolds “stop it” through a clenched smile before the distressed assistant scurries out of the limelight. Stop it 
After flaunting her killer curves on the red carpet, Beyonce slipped into a revealing pink jumpsuit, joining hubby Jay-Z on stage. Other Stories
